member.name: IP_SUFFIX_ORIGIN
member.summary: The IP_SUFFIX_ORIGIN enumeration specifies the origin of an IPv4 or IPv6 address suffix, and is used with the structure.

member.name: IP_SUFFIX_ORIGIN.IpSuffixOriginOther
member.summary: The IP address suffix was provided by a source other than those defined in this enumeration.

member.name: IP_SUFFIX_ORIGIN.IpSuffixOriginManual
member.summary: The IP address suffix was manually specified.

member.name: IP_SUFFIX_ORIGIN.IpSuffixOriginWellKnown
member.summary: The IP address suffix is from a well-known source.

member.name: IP_SUFFIX_ORIGIN.IpSuffixOriginDhcp
member.summary: The IP address suffix was provided by DHCP settings.

member.name: IP_SUFFIX_ORIGIN.IpSuffixOriginLinkLayerAddress
member.summary: The IP address suffix was obtained from the link-layer address.

member.name: IP_SUFFIX_ORIGIN.IpSuffixOriginRandom
member.summary: The IP address suffix was obtained from a random source.

summary.para: The IP address suffix should be unchanged. This value is used when setting the properties for a unicast IP interface when the value for the IP suffix origin should be left unchanged.
summary.div: Note This enumeration value is only available on Windows Vista and later.
